description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2a, lines 10-11. Physical description: 23 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal notes. Mild staining and a few repairs. Last leaf detached. Origin: According to Āghā Buzurg, work was completed in 1075 H [1664 or 1665]. The first few kitāb must have been completed earlier, as this copy is dated 14 Rabīʻ I 1074 H [16 October 1663], by Muḥammad Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad (leaf 288b); next to the colophon is a note in the hand of the author. Incipit: الحمد لله الذي نور روضة الدين البهية الزاهرة
author: Ibn Zayn al-Dīn, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1604-1691 or 1692
abstract: Volume 1 of a gloss on al-Shahīd al-Thānī's commentary on al-Lumʻah al-Dimashqīyah, through Kitāb al-ḥajj.
